alert.note: Alert for Cheboygan; Presque Isle (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 2:36AM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Presque Isle and southeastern Cheboygan Counties through 330 AM EDT... At 236 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Afton, or 11 miles southwest of Onaway, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Onaway, Tower and Allis Township around 240 AM EDT. Onaway State Park around 250 AM EDT. Ocqueoc and Millersburg around 255 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Rogers City, P H Hoeft State Park, Hawks, Forty Mile Point and Hagensville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
